definition: of or pertaining to the adrenal glands or their secretions, either of a pair of complex endocrine glands situated near the kidney
details:
adjective
- of or pertaining to the adrenal glands or their secretions
- near the kidneys
noun
- either of a pair of complex endocrine glands situated near the kidney
= synonyms: adrenal gland, suprarenal gland
